item.title: Skillcape emote
item.dc:creator: @I_Roll_Deep I Roll Deep
item.description:
@I_Roll_Deep wrote:

[quote=“zzjimmy, post:3, topic:413686”][quote author=nathanz link=topic=515647.msg3740585#msg3740585 date=1315311281]
thats server sided buddy.
[/quote]

I said that. sorry if it didn’t make sense and nvm i got it.[/quote]
declare it in the client class, and change the #### to the ids

item.title: Skillcape emote
item.dc:creator: @zzjimmy zzjimmy
item.description:
@zzjimmy wrote:

how would i merge this skill cape code in my server side client? Please help me. I’m using delta btw.

[code]public void SkillCape() {

if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == ####) { //attack
stillgfx(611, absY, absX);
setAnimation(4959);
sM(“You Do your skillcape emote”);

playerLevel[0] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]);
playerLevel[0] += 1;
sendFrame126(""+playerLevel[0]+"", 4016);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

}
if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == ####) { //herblore
stillgfx(626, absY, absX);
